item.description:
We will start at Tia's for Brunch at 12:30, then spend the rest of the afternoon wandering along the Harbor Walk for the Sail Boston festival. The day will conclude with live music at the South Boston Maritime Park. Please feel free to join us at any point along the way!



Sail Boston is an official Port of the Tall Ships Atlantic Challenge 2009 (TSAC). The trans-Atlantic regatta will start in Vigo, Spain. From there the fleet will race to Tenerife in the Canary Islands, en route to Bermuda. The fleet will then race to Charleston, South Carolina before racing to Boston, for Sail Boston 2009. From Boston the fleet will cruise in company north to Halifax, Canada. From there the fleet will race back across the North Atlantic to Belfast, Northern Ireland.


MORE INFO TO COME SOON!
item.how_to_find_us: Please contact us via cell if you miss the first part of the day (617) 645-9472

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Brunch Trip Tall Ships! (Sail Boston 2009)
